name: Fill Wooden Block Puzzle 8x8
description:
Best wood themed block puzzle game. Excise your concentration, best brain games for kids and adults with wood puzzle building blocks for free and you can enjoy it everywhere, every time without need online.

How to play:
-Drag the WOOD blocks to move them
-Try to fit them all in the row or column
-Don't worry, no time limits
-Game will be over if there are no room to drag.

Thanks to all beloved users with 5 stars reviews:

"Yep, sadly played many of these block games but THIS ONE IS THE BEST!" - Derby P. Fox

"You can play it for hours. It’s relaxing and the wooden sound of the blocks makes it a peaceful experience. Very fun." - IronBon

"This a low pressure satisfying way to forget your troubles and while away the hours. Tetris without the pressure." - BeegAlvin

"I play this game every day! It’s not only challenging, there’s just something about lining up the blocks that soothes me. A great game to play to de-stress for the day. I look forward to it every time I get home from work. Love it! Love it! Love it!" - Happywey

"I rarely play games but and flow free are two games I’ll play anytime I feel stressed. They are relaxing as you need to immerse yourself in the game in order to meet and/or surpass your goals. I love these games." - RSMeister

"This game is so addictive. I love the fact that you can turn the pieces. Reminds me of Tetris from days ago. Keep up the great games." - Kooky one

"I love this game—it’s addictive! Being able to rotate the blocks makes it more fun. I also like the graphics." - Like's Grandmother

"This is the best block game I have played. It doesn’t provide you with duplicate pieces that jam you up. I really enjoy the game and hope you do too." - dawg1954

"I download this game 90 days ago and I have been planning every day. When I have a lot on my mind it helps me to relax and think out of the box. Thanks for creating" - mrs. wisdom 46

"It’s addicting & becoming my favorite game" - Sgboo68

"I think this is an amazing game. It is muck better than and other wooden games like “Woody” or something else. I love that there is different modes. There is absolutely 0 complaints about this game! I would recommend this to everyone who hates ads. I personally have not experienced and ads so far. This is a great game for everybody and you should totally download it!" - ndhdjdjsjd

"We play because we want to challenge ourselves but also release stresses and tensions. This game can polish ourselves as well as releasing stress by relax music and actually turning the puzzles to the ways work for us. Better than other similar games in the markets which only allow you to challenge yourself, never allow you to change the situation by flipping the puzzles" - QLDLinc

"It’s funny how some of the combos fit together. Never ending entertainment!" - CloyCloy23

"Just think this is the very best mahjong app that I have ever played! The tiles are bigger and this makes it so much better and more fun! Thank you older player " - ramblermel

"Well made. Takes my mind off everything. Nice to be able to flip the cubes." - Nitsa12345

"This game is my emotional release however it is addictive" - widow Rita

"Of the "Wood block" puzzle games I have tried- this one has the rotate option and with the magic hat one can earn- the play is MUCH enhanced.... good stuff!" - jominy cricket

"These games are not only cleverly designed, they're attractive in appearance and even provide helpful tips. I suspect our family members will be having disputes over whose turn it is with the one iPad in the house. Excellent games and quite addictive." - Tuibenn
